text:
@morningmika @realDonaldTrump Herman Cain died because of the ignorance conservatives perpetuate every single day. Hopefully people will finally realize that COVID-19 ain’t no fuckin joke. 

Sorry if that’s hard to hear, but it’s about time people take this seriously. Or there will be more Herman Cains
